home.title: LASIKUU
home.intro: We provide software solutions, including design and consulting services.
home.intro2: Our offerings cover everything from creating and managing websites to building and maintaining databases and cloud services like AWS. Whether you need a new website, help with your current software, or expert advice, we're here to help.

about.title: About LASIKUU
about.content: LASIKUU was founded in March 2024 and is based in Japan. Services are offered in English, Japanese or Finnish.
about.name_explanation: As for the name, LASIKUU is Finnish and has the meaning of Glass Moon.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For more information and quotes, email or send us a message on LINE.

address.heading: Address
address.content: We will disclose without delay if requested.

tel.heading: Phone number
tel.content: We will disclose without delay if requested.

additionalfees.heading: Additional fees
additionalfees.content: Consumption tax (domestic) / credit card and bank transfer fees

cancelpolicy.heading: Cancellation (refund policy)
cancelpolicy.content: We do not accept cancellations after the contract. In the unlikely event of a cancellation during production, we will charge a cancellation fee according to the progress of the work. Also, even if no production work has been done, there will be no refund of the deposit after the contract has started.

returns.heading: Exchanges and returns policy
returns.content: Due to the nature of the service of providing data files and consulting, we cannot accept returns or exchanges.

delivery.heading: Delivery times and methods
delivery.content: We start planning and development at the time of contract. Delivery is done according to the contract terms.

payment.heading: Accepted payment methods
payment.content: Credit card or domestic/international bank transfer

paymentperiod.heading: Payment period
paymentperiod.content: Credit card payments are processed immediately, but bank transfers need to be made within 3 days of the order.

pricing.heading: Price
pricing.content: Varies by service. The price stated in the contract applies.

presskit.title: Press kit
presskit.about: Download our logos and business cards here.

2022.title: Founder moves to Japan
2022.content: The founder of LASIKUU moves to Japan in 2022 for studies and to pursue a career in software development.

2024.content: LASIKUU is founded in March 2024 in Kyoto, Japan as a Sole Proprietorship focusing on software development and web design.
2024.title: LASIKUU is founded

future.title: Future
future.content: What will the future hold? Only time will tell.
